name: Gloppy the Brave Green Slime Demo
name_original: Gloppy the Brave Green Slime Demo
description:
Welcome to the Demo of Gloppy the Brave Green Slime!

Join Gloppy as it finds its way through a new landscape to save its friend!

In the Demo you can-

  • Craft Materials!
  • Use a Rocky Shop!
  • Fight Rockos, Batteroos, and Flickers!
  • Travel through 2 different areas!
  • Talk to Blocky and a mysterious being!
  • Fight a boss!

And mostly importantly-

SIT ON A COUCH!!!

Feedback is strongly encouraged. I made this game for fun, and I want to know how to make it better!

If you have any ideas for the game, I'd love to hear them!

If there's any weird bugs, PLEASE TELL ME! I'd love to fix it and rerelease a better version and make the full game the best it can be!

And for now, Pyro143, signing out.

Made using GB Studio (go check it out it's really cool).
